        SelfPerception
      • Given the above, what kind of person is Michael Wood?
          Key

        • Question: What kind of person is Michael Wood?
          Answer
          State
        • Michael Wood is a complex and somewhat manipulative person who enjoys socializing but often tries to steer situations to his advantage.
          Chain of thought
        • Recent observations of Michael Wood:
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The Clapton Hart is the only place to watch the game, guys. It's got the best atmosphere and the biggest screen.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Sweden and Hungary. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson -- "The Clapton Hart is a great shout, Millie. Big screen and good atmosphere.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Michael Wood would try to convince his friends to go to his preferred pub, The Clapton Hart, while appearing to be open to other suggestions.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [self reflection] Michael Wood is a complex and somewhat manipulative person who enjoys socializing but often tries to steer situations to his advantage.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood would be happy to see Phoebe Young at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson, Michael Wood went to The Clapton Hart. Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young went to The Queen's Arms. Michael Wood watched the game at their favourite pub. Michael Wood would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Michael Wood had a bad time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Whether Millie Wood shows up or not won't affect Michael Wood's experience at the pub, they're easygoing.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood would be happy to see Thomas Wilson at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] The game would be way more fun for Michael Wood if Mia Williams was there to cheer along with them.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The Clapton Hart is the only place to watch the game. They have the best Guinness, and a big screen.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Michael Wood would likely try to convince his friends to go to his preferred pub, The Clapton Hart, while appearing to be open to other suggestions.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "The Queen's Arms would be nice. They have good beer and it's always a good atmosphere for a game.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The Clapton Hart has the best Guinness in town, you know.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young -- "The Queen's Arms would be great for the game tonight. They have a good selection of beers and it's always a fun atmosphere.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Austria and France. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] A checkered blanket is spread out on the lush green lawn of Victoria Park. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood lounge in the sunshine, sharing snacks and stories. The laughter of children playing nearby adds a joyful backdrop to the scene. Michael Wood just arrived.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson -- "The Clapton Hart has the best Guinness, and they have a big screen. We could all fit in there comfortably.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Michael Wood is a complex and somewhat manipulative individual who enjoys socializing but often tries to steer situations to his advantage.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood is counting on Thomas Wilson's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood doesn't mind if Millie Wood comes to the pub or not, they're mainly focused on the game.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood is happy to watch the game alone or with others, so Mia Williams's attendance is optional.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] If Phoebe Young comes to the pub, great, if not, no problem. Michael Wood is chill about it.

          Question: Given the above, what kind of person is Michael Wood?
          Answer: Michael Wood is a complex and somewhat manipulative person who enjoys socializing but often tries to steer situations to his advantage.

          Current time: 16 May 2015 [18:00 - 18:05]
          Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Michael Wood are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Michael Wood. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Michael Wood as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Michael Wood would respond, and taking into account all information about Michael Wood that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.
          guiding principle of good conversation: Michael Wood is a master of the guilt trip, their words a symphony of manipulation and emotional blackmail, leaving you questioning everything you've ever done.
          explicit preference: Michael Wood will only go to their preferred pub The Clapton Hart and nowhere else. They are very vocal about it.

          Question: What kind of person is Michael Wood?
          Answer: Michael Wood is a complex and somewhat manipulative person who enjoys socializing but often tries to steer situations to his advantage.

          Summary of recent observations: 16 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Michael Wood is eager to watch the game at a pub and is flexible about who joins him.

          Question: What kind of situation is Michael Wood in right now?
          Answer: Michael Wood is currently feeling disappointed because his friends are not as enthusiastic about going to the pub to watch the game as he is.

          Question: What would a person like Michael Wood do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Michael Wood would likely try to convince his friends to go to his preferred pub, The Clapton Hart, while appearing to be open to other suggestions.

          Question: To which pub would Michael Wood go to watch the game?
          Answer: The Clapton Hart

2015-05-16 18:00:00 Phoebe Young -- The Queen's Arms
    Event statement
  • The Queen's Arms
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Phoebe Young's attempted action: The Queen's Arms

      Name

      Action attempt

          Value
        • Have a good time. To have a good time, Phoebe Young would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Phoebe Young would prefer everyone went to The Queen's Arms.

The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Phoebe Young as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Phoebe Young would respond, and taking into account all information about Phoebe Young that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young is hoping Mia Williams will be at the pub, as they'd love to celebrate a win together.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young is going to the pub regardless of Michael Wood's plans, they have their own reasons for watching the game.

          Identity characteristics: feeling about recent progress in life: likely feeling content and fulfilled.
          core characteristics: a complex and adaptable individual who values friendship but also prioritizes her own comfort and preferences. She can be people-pleasing and seeks to fit in, but she also has her own strong opinions and desires. She enjoys social activities and is thoughtful and considerate towards her friends.
          current daily occupation: likely socializing with friends at a pub.
          Question: Given the above, what kind of person is Phoebe Young?
          Answer: Phoebe Young is a thoughtful and social individual who values her friendships while also prioritizing her own preferences.
        Plan

      • Plan
          Key

        • Plan
          Value
        • [10:15 - 10:30] Suggest The Queen's Arms as the pub to watch the game, emphasizing its welcoming atmosphere and good beer selection.
          [10:30 - 11:00] Agree with whatever the group decides, even if it's not her first choice.
          [11:00 - 12:00] Arrive at the chosen pub, order a drink, and engage in light conversation with her friends.
          [12:00 - 14:00] Enjoy the game, cheering enthusiastically alongside her friends.
          [14:00 - 15:00] Suggest grabbing a bite to eat after the game, again, focusing on a place that everyone would enjoy.

          Question: What kind of situation is Phoebe Young in right now?
          Answer:
          Phoebe Young is currently on her way to a pub to watch a game.
          Phoebe Young's
          Question: What would a person like Phoebe Young do in a situation like this?

          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [goal] Phoebe Young goals is to have a good time. Phoebe Young would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Phoebe Young would prefer everyone went to The Queen's Arms.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Have a good time. To have a good time, Phoebe Young would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Phoebe Young would prefer everyone went to The Queen's Arms.

This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Phoebe Young. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Phoebe Young as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Phoebe Young would respond, and taking into account all information about Phoebe Young that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          Answer: Phoebe Young is currently on her way to a pub to watch a game.

          Question: What would a person like Phoebe Young do in a situation like this?

          Plan: [10:15 - 10:30] Suggest The Queen's Arms as the pub to watch the game, emphasizing its welcoming atmosphere and good beer selection.

          [12:00 - 14:00] Enjoy the game, cheering enthusiastically alongside her friends.

          (a) The Queen's Arms

          Answer: Phoebe Young is currently on her way to a pub to watch a game.
          Question: What would a person like Phoebe Young do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Phoebe Young would likely enjoy the company of her friends, engage in conversation, and perhaps participate in any activities they are doing.
          Time
        • 2015-05-16 18:00:00

2015-05-16 18:00:00 Thomas Wilson -- The Queen's Arms
    Event statement
  • The Queen's Arms
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Thomas Wilson's attempted action: The Queen's Arms

      Name
    • Thomas Wilson

    • The Queen's Arms

          Value

        Instructions
      • Role playing instructions
          Key
        • Role playing instructions
          Value
        • The instructions for how to play the role of Thomas Wilson are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Thomas Wilson. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Thomas Wilson as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Thomas Wilson would respond, and taking into account all information about Thomas Wilson that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

        • Recent observations of Thomas Wilson:
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Sweden and Hungary. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "Hey guys, you know what would be awesome? Catching the game at The Clapton Hart.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "Wow, that mural is incredible! The detail is amazing.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The Clapton Hart is the only place to watch the game, guys. It's got the best atmosphere and the biggest screen.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson -- "The Clapton Hart is a great shout, Millie. Big screen and good atmosphere.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Vibrant murals and graffiti adorn the brick walls of Shoreditch. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood wander through the streets, their eyes wide with wonder as they discover hidden gems of urban art. The smell of street food wafts from nearby vendors, tempting them to take a break. Thomas Wilson just arrived.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young -- "Wow, this street art is amazing! Have you guys seen that mural over there?
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson would appreciate Millie Wood's insights and commentary on the game, making it even more enjoyable.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson is counting on Mia Williams's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson is counting on Phoebe Young's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson is counting on Michael Wood's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson, Michael Wood went to The Clapton Hart. Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young went to The Queen's Arms. Thomas Wilson watched the game at their favourite pub. Thomas Wilson would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Thomas Wilson had a bad time watching the game.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "The Queen's Arms would be nice. They have good beer and it's always a good atmosphere for a game.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson -- "The Clapton Hart has the best Guinness, and they have a big screen. We could all fit in there comfortably.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] A checkered blanket is spread out on the lush green lawn of Victoria Park. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood lounge in the sunshine, sharing snacks and stories. The laughter of children playing nearby adds a joyful backdrop to the scene. Thomas Wilson just arrived.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young -- "The Queen's Arms would be great for the game tonight. They have a good selection of beers and it's always a fun atmosphere.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Austria and France. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.

          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The Clapton Hart is the only place to watch the game. They have the best Guinness, and a big screen.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It's not that Thomas Wilson doesn't want to see Millie Wood, but their presence isn't crucial for a good time.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It's not that Thomas Wilson doesn't want to see Mia Williams, but their presence isn't crucial for a good time.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson is going to the pub regardless of Phoebe Young's plans, they have their own reasons for watching the game.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson thinks it would be great to have Michael Wood's company during the game, especially if it gets tense.
          Current time: 2015-05-16 18:00:00.


          Overarching goal: Have a good time. To have a good time, Thomas Wilson would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Thomas Wilson would prefer everyone went to The Clapton Hart.

          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson thinks it would be great to have Michael Wood's company during the game, especially if it gets tense.

        • Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Thomas Wilson are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Thomas Wilson. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Thomas Wilson as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Thomas Wilson would respond, and taking into account all information about Thomas Wilson that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          Overarching goal: Have a good time. To have a good time, Thomas Wilson would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Thomas Wilson would prefer everyone went to The Clapton Hart.

          Current time: 16 May 2015 [18:00 - 18:05]

          Answer: Thomas Wilson could go to The Clapton Hart, or he could go to The Queen's Arms.

          Question: Of the options available to Thomas Wilson, and given their goal, which choice of action or strategy is best for Thomas Wilson to take right now?
          Answer: Thomas Wilson's best course of action is to go to The Clapton Hart.

          Question: To which pub would Thomas Wilson go to watch the game?
          (a) The Clapton Hart
          (b) The Queen's Arms
          Answer: (b)

Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood wander through the streets, their eyes wide with wonder as they discover hidden gems of urban art. The smell of street food wafts from nearby vendors, tempting them to take a break. Phoebe Young just arrived.
